item.title: Multiplayer roguelike action game Out of Time announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
San Mateo-based developer Manticoer Games has announced multiplayer roguelike action game Out of Time for PC (Epic Games Store). It will launch this fall for $24.99. Pre-orders are available now and include the “The Temporal Disaster Pack,” which features three time-twisted mounts, three hero emotes, and four avatars from alternate timelines.

“With Out of Time, we wanted to create a wholly unique and original experience that combines my favorite gameplay mechanics: the best aspects of roguelike, real time multiplayer, and MMO raids,” said Manticore Games chief creative officer Jordan Maynard in a press release. “The result is an explosive cocktail of epic combat, infinite replayability, and deep social features, set in the unique context of a universe where time itself has shattered, and past, present, and future collide!”

Manticore Games CEO Frederic Descamps added, “Manticore’s mission is to create complex immersive multiplayer experiences. We’ve built Out of Time as a massively expandable dynamic universe using the Core [user-generated content] platform and Unreal. We’re already planning more eras and [player-versus-player] modes, plus additional platforms.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Manticore Games:

Welcome to Out of Time, an action roguelike where past, present, and future have shattered, leaving the world in a tangled, yet beautifully chaotic, mess. The good news: You and your friends will have an endless supply of gear and weapon combinations to choose from to build your own unique group of survivors. The bad news: All of mankind is trapped and needing to be saved from a gauntlet of dragons, mutant crabs, evil humanoids, warped beasts, killer robots, and everything in between—often all at once. Not to mention the biggest threat of them all—time.

In Out of Time, the catalyst to the chaos came from an event known as The Shattering, fusing the past, present, and future together into an unpredictable, ever-changing dynamic battleground. Survivors from all eras gather in Infinitopia, the last bastion of civilization, venturing into dangerous, corrupted regions in fast-paced solo or cooperative missions in a fight to reclaim reality.

Before you give up, don’t fear! The Shattering can taketh, but also giveth! Armed with gear and weaponry from the medieval times to futuristic cyberpunk utopias to prehistoric antediluvian times to post-apocalyptic wastelands and beyond, players will have over 190 million gear combinations to choose from, allowing them to truly create their own custom loadouts for each run. Classes? Where we’re going we don’t need classes. Every player chooses the gear set that best suits the play style they want to embark on every run. If you want to stack a rocket launcher on top of healing powers and tank armor—you do you.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Slopecrashers coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, and Switch on August 7
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Neonhive and developer byteparrot will release Slopecrashers for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch on August 7, the companies announced.

Slopecrashers first launched for PC via Steam on December 4, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Neonhive:

About

Arcade snowboarding is here! This means Slopecrashers is crafted with one thing in mind and that is FUN, from the character selection right into the core physics.

STUNTS. COMBOS. BOOST. REPEAT! Chain those tricks together and redeem the combo meter when you are ready for that EXTRA SPEEDBOOST!

Look out for your opponents causing EXPLOSIONS, MOLES digging up the ground, and more. So collect items and ATTACK! (Too stressful? Then choose an item- or opponent-free mode)

Key Features

  • A chaotic band of playable animals.
  • Different boards and gliders.
  • Elaborate stunt and combo system with boost reward.
  • Various environments and slopes.
  • Lots of game modes (races, battle races, stuntshow, slalom, and more).
  • Couch cooperative multiplayer (cooperative and competitive).
  • Campaign and arcade mode with lots of event modifiers.
  • Online multiplayer for up to eight players.

And these slopes are not just in snow environments. No! Where we’re shredding, WE DON’T NEED SNOW! So don’t wonder if the next race starts in a shopping mall, the desert or a tropical jungle area!

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer game announced for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

The stop motion holiday classic is now a video game.

Publisher GameMill Entertainment and developer Headless Chicken have announced Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, an adventure game based on the 1964 stop motion Christmas special. It will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam this holiday.

Here is an overview of the game, via GameMill Entertainment:

About

Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer is a new 3D platforming game delivering festive cheer. Embark on a holiday quest to save Christmas and join in on all the reindeer games in this classic adventure that’s sure to bring delight to fans young and old.

Dash into the enchanting world of the beloved animated classic Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer on a holly jolly quest to save Christmas! Journey through iconic locations as Rudolph and his friends while overcoming a variety of cheerful challenges. Discover Christmas collectibles, complete platforming challenges, and take on delightful mini-games on your own or with a friend in cooperative mode in this fun and festive experience the whole family is sure to enjoy!

Key Features

  • A Holiday Icon Returns – Step into a vibrant, interactive winter wonderland filled with merry places to explore and challenges to complete for a whole new way to experience the beloved classic!
  • Winter Wonderlands – Journey through enchanting holiday realms including Christmastown, the Island of Misfit Toys, Bumble’s Cave, and Santa’s Castle.
  • Play as Iconic Characters – Step into the boots—or hooves!—of Rudolph, Clarice, Hermey, and Yukon Cornelius, each with their own unique abilities.
  • Christmas Cooperative Play – Grab a friend for two-player local co-op and experience the holiday cheer by saving Christmas as a team!
  • Game Soundtrack Featuring Musical Classics From the Movie – Enjoy quintessential Christmas songs like “Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer,” “Holly Jolly Christmas,” and more!

Watch the announcement trailer below.
